Comment: Leftists who object to what the people of El Salvador did to save their country are welcome to explain why America has deep blue cities in deep blue states that have been crime-filled shitholes for decades. Democrats have had plenty of time to prove that their approach to criminal justice works.  Hiroshima got firebombed and nuked and yet the people of Hiroshima rebuilt it to be even greater than before. They were destitute, they were traumatized, they were conquered, and Japan didn't have the same abundance of wealth to spare that America did after World War II. Today, Hiroshima is one of the safest cities in the world.  What's Detroit's excuse? Chicago? Baltimore? They'll point to red states with high crime rates as a counterargument and would you look at that, the crime's happening in the Democrat-controlled cities. You could point to some unique factors about these cities, but what matters more is that regardless of the causes of crime, Democrats aren't putting criminals in jail.
